title: Seoul Moment
seoulmoment: Seoul Moment Co., Ltd.(首爾映像有限公司)
address: Address : No. 231, Section 4, Zhongxiao E Rd, Da’an District, Taipei City, Taiwan 106
identity_contents: Seoul Moment is a global style platform founded on the unique local sensibilities of Seoul’s most iconic districts—HASH: Hannam-dong, Apgujeong, Seongsu, and Hongdae.
storyteller_contents: Through its platform and brand magazine, Seoul Moment introduces Korean brands to the Taiwan market, conveying each brand’s identity and story to local consumers with a sophisticated touch.
connector_contents: Seoul Moment seeks to showcase Seoul’s modern sensibility on a global stage and promote cross-border business exchange between Korea and Taiwan in the fields of fashion, beauty, and lifestyle.
vision_title1: Seoul Moment is a K-lifestyle platform that curates the sensibility of Korean brands for the global market,
vision_title2: offering Taiwanese consumers an immersive and trend-driven experience.
platform_contents: A K-Lifestyle platform that connects Korean brands’ strategic growth with the sensibility-led consumption of Taiwanese consumers.
trend_magazine_contents: Through its in-house Trend Magazine, the platform facilitates Korean companies’ entry into the Taiwan market and enhances purchasing diversity within Taiwan’s consumer landscape.
data_analysis_contents: An innovative data analytics strategy integrating insights from Taiwanese consumer purchasing trends with Korean companies’ brand strategies.
mission_description: By connecting Seoul’s sensibility and stories through data and content, we deliver the fastest and most authentic K-lifestyle experience to Taiwanese consumers.
mission_subtitle_description_1: Reflecting Identity and Storytelling elements (trend-driven sensibilities from Hannam-dong, Apgujeong, Seongsu, and Hongdae).
mission_subtitle_description_2: Integrating Data Analysis with Trend Magazine Strategy
mission_subtitle_3: Delivering the Fastest and Most Authentic Experience to Taiwanese Consumers
mission_subtitle_description_3: Aligned with platform objectives and global expansion
contact_us_subtitle: Seoul Moment creates meaningful connections. Let us hear your story.
